title: Delaware & Lehigh National Heritage Corridor: Park Home
body: Preserving History  Come journey through five Pennsylvania counties bursting with heritage and brimming with outdoor adventure. You will find something for everyone. Follow a history trail marked with stories about hearty lumberjacks, coal miners, lock tenders, and railroaders. Explore quiet canal paths, challenging bike trails and the rippling waters of the Delaware and Lehigh Rivers.              Plan Your Visit   Learn what to do and where to go when you visit!
